changes: Crew pagination works now.
Fixed an issue where rpc was returning invalid proofs, affecting transfers.
Fixed a regression in some dialog views not overflowing properly.
Fixed an edge case where transferring crew fails if crew record doesn't exist.
Fixed an issue preventing fleets from being formed due to crew count.
Crew deposit/withdrawal transactions enabled with lookup table.
Fixed an issue where only 1 crew shows up on the wallet.
Crew Quarters view and updated Port of Entry.
Leftover upgrade processes at maxed out starbases can now be cancelled.
Fixed an issue in the overview/sector survey tab where scanning SDUs there did not result in any feedback.
Fixed an issue where incorrect starbase and starbase player keys were being used in the transaction if user runs into a 'Seat reservation expired' error joining a room
The LP shown in the top now reflects the daily amount redeemed.
Recipe usage limit data is shown now.
Fixed an issue where longer crafting transactions were failing due to exceeding Solana's 64 instruction limit.
Manual LP redemption on the UI is no longer possible.
Fixed an issue where passing in the wrong profile key index could cause the transaction builder to fail.
Fixed an issue with hotwallets where the points spending permission was incorrectly being used for vaults.
Auto LP redemption now works with hotwallets. Permissions MUST be saved again with either upkeep or upgrade selected in order for it to work.
Fixed issue with meta crafting recipes appearing in other crafting sections
Fixed an issue with creating user redemption accounts with starbase upgrade/upkeep submissions
LP overhaul. Automatic LP contribution to epoch upon LP earning actions.
Fixed starbase cargo permissions for hotwallet
Added Meta Crafting Station to the Craft Workshop
Fixed UI crash in Staff Efforts tab
Upgrade RPC cluster configuration to use Ironforge
Fixed incorrect SDU upgrade recipe being used for starbase upgrades
Fixed overview crafting times to match starbase operations view
Fixed preview upgrade duration and completed crafting list calculations
Ships show up in local starbase inventory again
Fix an issue where recipes were missing after program updates for recipes on chain
Show Tier 6 recipes at Central Space Station
Update crafting duration to track program changes to food upkeep time
Warp buttons disable correctly now if insufficient fuel
When ATLAS Prime is enabled the Start Crafting button now checks the Vault balance for sufficient ATLAS instead of the wallet
Fixed an issue when submitting upgrades for Starbases tier 2 and higher would return the items to the inventory
Changed the behavior of the Stop Mining button so that it doesn't get stuck on 'Awaiting Transaction' any longer
Changed Loyalty Points redemption and ATLAS claiming from trying to use the hot wallet
Changed the SDU Starbase Upgrade to award more Loyalty Points
Fixed an issue where players were unable to cancel crafting
Fixed an issue where players were unable to start crafting using the hot wallet
ATLAS Prime is now available again
Hot wallets and Vault have been added
ATLAS Prime will use the Vault's ATLAS and SOL to pay for transactions
Hot wallets offer a new way of auto-approving transactions by utilizing the ATLAS and SOL in the Vault
Adjusted the RPC configuration
Added SDUs per scan to fleet stats table
Fleets now gather SDUs according to a new, aggregated, SDU/Scan stat
Removed global SDU per minute and fleet SDU per scan limits
Added sector logic to determine the number of SDUs that can be discovered per scan (max theoretical of 1000 SDU/scan)
Data Runner ships now receive a boost to their SDU/Scan stat
Data Runner ships do not consume Food or Toolkits when scanning
Increased scan cooldown times
Increased regeneration period for sector scan chance
Removed windfall SDU drops
Reduced Starbase Food requirements by 33%
Reduced both Food and Toolkit scaling requirements by half. (Ex: Tier 2 will be 1.5x tier 1 requirements whereas before it was 2x.
Framework 2 and Toolkits 2 now require 1 steel (reduced from 2)
Removed old wallet code for Solflare which should resolve some issues their users were having
Fixed an issue where a fleet displayed the incorrect amount of ships in the fleet
Fixed an issue where a character could be partially initialized which blocked players from depositing ships or resources
Fixed an issue where players could not start crafting recipes above Tier 1
Added an indicator at the right bottom of the screen to show if there's any pending transactions
Display mining-related values and calculations for Armstrong ships should now be shown correctly
Fuel, ammo and cargo for mining and subwarping fleets is now visualized in real-time
The settings interface has been renewed
Docked fleets now show the same sector name as undocked fleets
Several improvements for mobile devices
Mining now shows a countdown timer in the fleet status
The fleet disband confirmation dialog now closes upon confirmation
Estimated food used for mining is now calculated properly
Transaction sending for stop mining is now more explicit
Added a confirmation for disband fleet button
Added a changelog to the settings menu
Fixed flashing cargo in in the fleet tooltip
Improved fleet statuses
Removed fixed width of player fleets container
Exclude respawned fleets in hangar actions
Fixed the fleet mining view so it doesn't cause blank screens
Calculating the mined amount is now more accurate
Added a disband action to the fleet command buttons
Adjusted the basic mobile dialog size for functionality
'Show all fleets' setting is now saved in the browser cache
Fleet locations while warping should now render correctly
Adjusted the color scheme of fleets based on the largest ship in the fleet
Fixed a bug where the map view would snap to your CSS when hovering another fleet
Fixed issues with installing finished upgrades at a starbase
Fixed an issue that caused the 'partially disbanded fleets' banner to not show at all
Fixed an issue where the connection flow would not work after disconnecting
Removed unused states for crafting processes causing them to appear as 'Pending Materials'
Show the correct status for claimed crafts
Fixed an issue when switching wallets
Clicking on an amount in the inventory will now put it in the input field
Made the font size for some values dynamic to fit larger values better inside of the views
Fixed the wallet not being able to auto-connect
Fixed scanning on sectors with a starbase
Show food balance instead of toolkit balance in the sector survey overview
Better disconnect logic and profile updating
Fixed the wallet selection being stuck with a greyed out continue button
Fixed the terms and conditions dialog having some weird styling
Welcome to SAGE Labs Starbased!
